column4: hello, my wired lan connection is not working in ubuntu 10.04. on windows i just plug in the cable and it works, with no specific config. what can i do please?
what do you mean by 'no specific config'?
that i just plug the cable in and it works, on win
you probably need to go into windows and look at the network settings and apply them to ubuntu's network manager
<mickster04> LaPizza: get up a terminal and type in ifconfig => and then ?
you mean windows is set to auto-configure?
then next time you boot into ubuntu, open the network settings dialog and make sure eth0 is set to 'auto'.
maybe the dns isnt working on ubuntu ?
